channel.title: Minecraft Beta 1.2 Updates
channel.description:
Well, after reading about the updates, I think it's well worth the temporary offline time.
http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Version_history
[u][b]New additions:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]charcoal [/li][li]Note Blocks (right click to tune, trigger to play) [/li][li]15 wool dyes [/li][li]A new water dwelling mob (Squid) [/li][li]New tree types (Birch, Pine) [/li][li]Reeds magically turned into sugar canes. They still make paper. [/li][li]A bunch of new crafting recipes [/li][li]One secret useful block (Dispenser) [/li][li]One secret pretty block (Sandstone block) [/li][li]Cake [/li][li]Sugar - Crafted from Sugar Cane [/li][li]Default furnaces given new look [/li][li]Bones added to the drop table, exclusively for skeleton archers. [/li][li]Bones can be crafted into Bonemeal. [/li][li]New gray, light gray, and black sheep. Drop correspondingly colored wool. [/li][li]Tools made out of stone and wood are now twice as durable. [/li][li]New ore type (Lapis Lazuli) [/li][li]Spiders can climb up walls. [/li][li]Mob Spawners now show a rotating model inside of what they spawn [/li][li]Wheat Seeds might be harvested more often when plowing grass blocks. [/li][/ul]
[u][b]Bugfixes:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Paintings work in multiplayer [/li][li]Disconnecting while riding no longer keeps the player in the world [/li][li]A bunch more state is properly synched in multiplayer [/li][li]Fixed colors going weird on PowerPC [/li][li]Fixed a horrible chunk reload loop in singleplayer [/li][li]Fixed most lighting bugs in newly generated SMP maps [/li][li]Falling sand behaves better in SMP [/li][li]Fixed a few crash on load level bugs [/li][li]Jack-O-Lantern now has correct tooltip. [/li][li]Sheep now visibly lose their wool when hit.[/li][/ul]
Discuss your favorites.
My favorite is the dispenser, if you have arrows in there and push a lever, it will literally shoot the arrows out of it; making perfect traps.

item.title: Minecraft Beta 1.2 Updates
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

reyx7:

So is there any way to walk to the nether or does it just not exist at all

Doesn’t exist. At least, not unless you set is so everything is the nether.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Beta 1.2 Updates
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:8, topic:378239”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=474117.msg3466871#msg3466871 date=1294969954]
Can you activate the nether world now for multiplayer?
[/quote]

You were already able to do that.

Two reasons why we can’t go to the nether.

  1. Fire is disabled.
  2. Nether is disabled through the server settings[/quote]

That’s not right. The server setting is either:

  1. Entire server is nether
  2. Entire server is not nether

It still doesn’t support traveling in between them, no servers do.

Cole1497:

Each time there’s an upgrade to where the price raises, you have to buy each upgrade, whereas the Alpha users get upgrades for free.

No. All upgrades are free no matter when you buy it. It says so right on the website.

Read full topic

Hide bitches, you can’t hide from your dirt towers![/quote]

Pblord7:

I like all the updates I will end up buying Minecraft soon

You should have bought it in Alpha, like me and a few others from this server did.
Each time there’s an upgrade to where the price raises, you have to buy each upgrade, whereas the Alpha users get upgrades for free.

item.title: Minecraft Beta 1.2 Updates
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

reyx7:

Can you activate the nether world now for multiplayer?

You were already able to do that.

Two reasons why we can’t go to the nether.

  1. Fire is disabled.
  2. Nether is disabled through the server settings

item.title: Minecraft Beta 1.2 Updates
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Spiders can climb up walls.
Oh shit.

What about castles? I am obviously not covering that up…

Tools made out of stone and wood are now twice as durable. One secret useful block (Dispenser)
are nice too. The squid, idk about that... well that spawn in my water elevator? :|

EDIT:

Uses
  • Sandstone can be used to make sandcastles, as the sandstone blocks are not affected by gravity.
  • Spiders cannot climb sandstone.

so yeh, a temporary solution. Still don’t like it but I can deal with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Beta 1.2 Updates
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well, after reading about the updates, I think it’s well worth the temporary offline time.

http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Version_history

New additions:

[ul][li]charcoal
[/li][li]Note Blocks (right click to tune, trigger to play)
[/li][li]15 wool dyes
[/li][li]A new water dwelling mob (Squid)
[/li][li]New tree types (Birch, Pine)
[/li][li]Reeds magically turned into sugar canes. They still make paper.
[/li][li]A bunch of new crafting recipes
[/li][li]One secret useful block (Dispenser)
[/li][li]One secret pretty block (Sandstone block)
[/li][li]Cake
[/li][li]Sugar - Crafted from Sugar Cane
[/li][li]Default furnaces given new look
[/li][li]Bones added to the drop table, exclusively for skeleton archers.
[/li][li]Bones can be crafted into Bonemeal.
[/li][li]New gray, light gray, and black sheep. Drop correspondingly colored wool.
[/li][li]Tools made out of stone and wood are now twice as durable.
[/li][li]New ore type (Lapis Lazuli)
[/li][li]Spiders can climb up walls.
[/li][li]Mob Spawners now show a rotating model inside of what they spawn
[/li][li]Wheat Seeds might be harvested more often when plowing grass blocks. [/li][/ul]

Bugfixes:

[ul][li]Paintings work in multiplayer
[/li][li]Disconnecting while riding no longer keeps the player in the world
[/li][li]A bunch more state is properly synched in multiplayer
[/li][li]Fixed colors going weird on PowerPC
[/li][li]Fixed a horrible chunk reload loop in singleplayer
[/li][li]Fixed most lighting bugs in newly generated SMP maps
[/li][li]Falling sand behaves better in SMP
[/li][li]Fixed a few crash on load level bugs
[/li][li]Jack-O-Lantern now has correct tooltip.
[/li][li]Sheep now visibly lose their wool when hit.[/li][/ul]

Discuss your favorites.

My favorite is the dispenser, if you have arrows in there and push a lever, it will literally shoot the arrows out of it; making perfect traps.

Read full topic
